item.title: Source of "rotten egg" smell identified in Gloucester
item.description: The city of Gloucester says it's identified the source of a "strong odor" that smells like rotten eggs.

item.title: $10,000 CD account moves to make before a September Fed rate cut
item.description: Don't rush into opening a $10,000 CD account this month before considering these three savvy moves.

item.title: At least 15 killed in funicular rail car crash in Lisbon, Portugal
item.description: The cause of the deadly crash remains unclear after an electric streetcar derailed in Lisbon, Portugal.

item.title: Here's how far mortgage rates have dropped in 2025 (and how much further they can still fall)
item.description: Mortgage interest rates have been falling for much of 2025. Here's how far they've dropped and what to expect next.

item.title: Lisbon funicular crash death toll climbs to 16, including American
item.description: Lisbon's Elevador da Gloria funicular streetcar has carried tourists in Portugal's capital for more than a century. The cause of its deadly crash rema...
